- inherited (select âYesâ) from the parent folder. The folder will be created with the same permissions as the above level.
Or
- customized (Select âNoâ) : You will be allowed to change and define individual permissions.

permissions.EveNoAccess.help: The user cannot access the Agenda
permissions.hint.text:
The 'inheritance permissions' are the rights to access a folder / document inherited from one level above : IG level > root of the Library > folder > subfolders > documents.

Deselect (uncheck) the option 'Inherit permissions' allow you to change a user or profile access rights for the folder / document by defining individual permissions.
Note that profiles with 'Administer' permission on Library service and the owner of the folder / document continue to have all access rights to this folder / document regardless of the permission set.
permissions.InfAccess.help: The user can access the Information service and read its content. He is not able to create or edit any content
permissions.InfAdmin.help: The user can create, edit and delete any content in the Information service
permissions.InfManage.help: The user can create, edit and delete own content. He can only read content created by other users
permissions.InfNoAccess.help: The user cannot access the Information service
permissions.inheritance.toggle.failed: Impossible to change to permission inheritance
permissions.leader.exception.explanation: For leaders, only the profile title can be edited.
permissions.LibAccess.help: The user can access the Library and read its content. He is not able to create or edit any content.
permissions.LibAdmin.help: The user can create, edit and delete any content.
permissions.LibEditOnly.help: The user can edit any content. He is not able to upload content (this also includes the upload of translations).
permissions.LibFullEdit.help: The user can manage any content. He cannot delete content created by other users.
permissions.LibManageOwn.help: The user can create, edit and delete own content. He can only read content created by other users.
permissions.LibNoAccess.help: The user cannot access the Library.
permissions.manage.page.title:
Manage the permissions
given to this element
permissions.more.information.title: More information about the permission levels
permissions.NwsAccess.help: The user can access all forums and topics and read the comments. He is not able to create or edit any content
permissions.NwsAdmin.help: The user has moderate rights and can define the permissions and notifications on forums and topics
permissions.NwsModerate.help: The user can create, edit and delete forums, topics and comments. He is able to approve or reject comments in moderated forums
permissions.NwsNoAccess.help: The user cannot access the Forums
permissions.NwsPost.help: The user can access all forums, create topics and post comments
permissions.selection.explanation: Select the users or profiles to assign a permission
permissions.selection.label: Users or profiles
post.waiting.approval: This post is waiting for approval
preview.messages.processing: Trying to convert the document for preview... (Conversion takes place in background)
preview.messages.send.to.convert: The document is sent to be converted for preview. Please try previewing it again in a few minutes.
profile.delete.confirmation: Do you confirm the deletion of the profile?
profile.delete.more.information: This will automatically uninvite all the members having this profile.
profile.import.help: Select one profile to import into your Interest group.
profile.manage.page.title:
Manage the access profiles
of the Interest group
search.empty.result: Not any result for your search

shared.space.link.add.succeed: The shared folder link has been created
shared.space.link.back: Back to the previous Interest group.
space.update-properties.failed.409: Another file or folder with this name already exists
space.update-properties.failed: Impossible to update the folder's details
space.update-properties.succeed: The folder's details have been updated
spaces.sharing.all.shared: There are no additional Interest groups to share with
spaces.sharing.display.none: This folder is not being shared with any other Interest group
spaces.sharing.share.change.permission.f: The permission of the shared folder could not be changed
spaces.sharing.share.change.permission.s: The permission of the shared folder was changed successfully
spaces.sharing.error:
This folder is no longer shared with you.

This may be due to the owner stopping sharing the folder, or deleting this folder or the group it is in.
splash.help.explore.content.2: The news feed: all the recent updates that happened in your Interest Groups
splash.help.explore.content.3: Your favourites: all documents or folders that you bookmarked.
splash.help.explore.content.4: The files that you have lately uploaded and downloaded.
splash.help.explore.content.5: Here you can find the Interest Groups you recently visited.
splash.help.explore.content.6: All the Interest Groups you are member of with the respective access profile.
splash.help.explore.content.7: Reminds you of the next events you are invited to or the public ones.
splash.help.explore.content.8: Access your account details or a few quick links. This menu is visible in the whole application.
splash.help.explore.content.9: Not feeling comfortable with the new User Interface? You can still enter the former interface by clicking here.
splash.help.explore.intro: The User Dashboard gives an overview of the recent updates in the Interest Groups you are member of and allows to quickly access recently browsed Interest Groups, documents, forums and much more.
splash.help.explore.title: Explore your new Dashboard
splash.help.help.content.1: You can now search in all the articles and the FAQs. Just use the search bar on top of the page.
splash.help.help.content.2: We will regularly highlight the most important articles.
splash.help.help.content.3: Don't hesitate to navigate among all the help categories in order to learn more about the new User Interface.
splash.help.help.content.4: Facing any issue in your daily use of CIRCABC? Use the Contact form and ask for help.
splash.help.help.content.5: Quick access to important sites or information
splash.help.help.intro: The Help service has been redesigned for more clarity and a faster access to our FAQs.
splash.help.help.title: The new Help service
splash.help.information.content.2: Use different types of cards: date, image, document or just text.
splash.help.information.content.3: Highlight news that are more important with colour effects.
splash.help.information.content.4: Quickly go through all the latest information.
splash.help.information.content.5: Everything is dated, including the first and the last modification.
splash.help.information.intro: The new information service has been completely reviewed. You can now post news and give another dimension to your communication.
splash.help.information.title: The information service
splash.help.intro.1: As you probably noticed, a few things have changed here.
splash.help.intro.2: Let's have a quick tour of the biggest changes

welcome.features.forums: Share your opinions in the forums
welcome.features.invite: Invite people to join the conversation
welcome.title: The easiest way to share information in the European Commission
